channel.title: Catholic in a Small Town
channel.itunes:summary: In this weekly podcast, Mac and Katherine, who are Catholic converts, talk about raising kids, Catholic issues, scouting, movies, books, games, podcasts and anything else that comes up. Mac and Katherine have been podcasting since 2006.
channel.itunes:author: Mac and Katherine Barron
channel.description:
A podcast about a Catholic couple raising kids in a small town.
Faith. Family. Fun...Scandalous.
channel.itunes:subtitle: A podcast about a Catholic couple raising kids in a North Georgia town.

item.title: CST #463: Mosquito Magnet
item.description:
We spend Labor Day weekend at Mom’s. Ben gets a jalopy, Jack Ryan is pretty good and the dangers of comfort in light of the scandals in the Church.

item.title: CST #462: Pantless Tubing
item.description:
A show two weeks in the making! Sam’s B-day, tubing with Mr. Wilder, working on the basement and a homeschool update. We watch Guernsey potato pie peel club thingie and Katherine reads A People’s History of the Vampire Uprising. Finally, we talk frustrations about last week’s readings… and scandals are bad…and Mac wrote a book.

 

Movies & TV:

The Geurnsey Literary Potato Peel Pie Society

 

Books:

A People’s History of the Vampire Uprising by Raymond A. Villareal

 

Other:

My Book at Amazon

item.title: CST #434: Boxing an Orangutan
item.description:
Mac’s dad, Frank Barron, passed away after a fighting pancreatic cancer for just under 2 years. We talk about being home for the funeral, the movies 12 Strong and Paddington 2, and try to process the reality of our parents in heaven.

 

Movies & TV:

12 Strong

Paddington 2

Maze Runner: Scorch Trials
item.content:encoded:
